item.title: Furniture, Basing, Crafting and Farming. More suggestions for Decimation.
item.author: invalid@example.com (Electricdarkness)
item.dc:creator: Electricdarkness
item.content:encoded:
Furniture
There should be lootable furniture in the house like kitchen cabinets, refrigerators and drawers. These would have things like kitchen knives, crackers, canned food, chips, drinks and rotting food.
.Living Room furniture like .
-different colored couches
-cushioned chairs different colors
-coffee tables
-night stands
-tall and short lamps.
.Bedroom Furniture like
-more realistic beds different colors
-curtains
-floor rugs
.Bathroom...

Furniture, Basing, Crafting and Farming. More suggestions for Decimation.

item.title: Recommendation for Decimation's future updates.
item.author: invalid@example.com (Electricdarkness)
item.dc:creator: Electricdarkness
item.content:encoded:
What I would like to see added to Decimation
One thing I would really like to see added to Decimation is a more so survival factor over the killing everybody factor. This would mean making some sort of way to have an extremely large map that could be modified to certain points. This would also mean adding several things that Decimation is currently lacking. Such as detailed cars, a more complex crafting system, farming etc. ...

Recommendation for Decimation's future updates.

item.title: How to Fix: I am getting Kicked by Anticheat
item.author: invalid@example.com (ScottehBoeh)
item.dc:creator: ScottehBoeh
item.content:encoded:
How to Fix: I am getting Kicked by Anticheat
This issue occurs when attempting to join an Official Server, or a community server that has Anticheat enabled. If you are 100% sure that you do not have any hacked clients or game-tampering modifications installed (except for Optifine) then the following fixes may help:

  • Possible Reason: You have other mods in your /mods/ folder. This means that Decimation has detected other mods installed on your game and therefore...

How to Fix: I am getting Kicked by Anticheat

item.title: How to Fix: Game not Starting Properly after I Update!
item.author: invalid@example.com (ScottehBoeh)
item.dc:creator: ScottehBoeh
item.content:encoded:
How to Fix: Game not Starting Properly after Update:
This is an issue that occurs after updating your game and restarting it. This can happen due to several different reasons:

  • Possible Reason: You are using a 1.7.10 folder inside of your /mods/ folder. Sadly, the mod does not support this, meaning that you'll have to use the normal /mods/ folder without a 1.7.10 folder.
    ✅ How to Fix: Perform a clean...

How to Fix: Game not Starting Properly after I Update!

item.title: Permission Nodes: All Command Permission Nodes
item.author: invalid@example.com (ScottehBoeh)
item.dc:creator: ScottehBoeh
item.content:encoded:
Permission Nodes

The following list contains all required Decimation permission nodes for those who are running servers with GroupManager or PermissionsEx. Note that these commands can be bypassed for opped players.

  • Bottlecaps Commands (/caps give)
    • - net.decimation.mod.common.common_commands.Command_BottleCaps

  • Clan Commands (/clan create, disband, invite etc)
    • - net.decimation.mod.server.clans.ClanCommands
    ...

Permission Nodes: All Command Permission Nodes

NPC Factions

item.title: problem with the upgrade
item.author: invalid@example.com (_CabbKing_)
item.dc:creator: _CabbKing_
item.content:encoded:
I had just downloaded the mod and I had opened minecraft but I could not play because I had to update the mod and then I updated it. Once I do this shut down minecraft, as expected, I reopened it and it was written "play" I tried to enter the server in New York but came out the anticheat that said that there were other mods in the folder of mods. I went to check and saw that after the update was inserted another .jar file in the mod folder: "decimationvoicechat.jar" I removed and closed...

problem with the upgrade

item.title: Problems occur after update

item.content:encoded:
Decimation on my Technic Launcher stopped working after I started the updates that came out today. When I clicked update, it continues to load slowly than stops and stays at 82% for almost 2 hours. Any ideas on how to fix it or will there be another update that will fix this problem? It’s...

item.title: VEHICLES & GUNS
item.author: invalid@example.com (Deathly)
item.dc:creator: Deathly
item.content:encoded:
Dear Community,

I want to suggest some nice ideas which i have thought over, that should probably get added to make Decimation more realistic and increase the fun factor.

Lets begin with the
Vehicles:

1) Humvee: 5 Seater, mounted .50 Cal MG (my favorite Vehicle for the ground), add trunk storage, so its getting possible to make a mobile base or supporting a clan with supplies
2) AH-64D „Apache Longbow“: 2 Seater, AGM Hellfires, Hydra 70 and maybe some MG's, make it so that the Pilot is...

VEHICLES & GUNS

item.title: Helicopters

item.content:encoded:
Dear Admins

Hey so i am an old clan leader i used to love making an army and airdropping it into a position and also using it as a show of force of my army but now there are none. So i am hoping they might get re added but might be fuel hungry so they aren't overpowered.

Falor
